Content for CWE ID: 89

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 429
Cwe : 89
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 3

Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList db = Find_DB() ;
CxList sanitize = Find_SQL_Sanitize();

CxList dbParams = All.GetParameters(db);

result = All.FindSQLInjections(db + Find_Read() - All.FindByShortName("ExecuteNonQuery"), 
								dbParams, sanitize);
